comments:
My command line looks like this:


%JAVACMD% -cp "%BIRTCLASSPATH%" -DBIRT_HOME="%BIRT_HOME%\Report Engine" org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner  -f  PDF -o output  pdfTest.rptdesign 

It would seem there is no way to specify the name of the output pdf file, I need different outputs for different parameters.

(In reply to comment #0)
> My command line looks like this:
> %JAVACMD% -cp "%BIRTCLASSPATH%" -DBIRT_HOME="%BIRT_HOME%\Report Engine"
> org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner  -f  PDF -o output 
> pdfTest.rptdesign 

The command line was actually like this:
org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.ReportRunner  -f PDF -o output.pdf  pdfTest.rptdesign

The problem was that the format was PDF and was getting compared with .pdf

traces.message: output\pdfTest.PDF (The system cannot find the pa th specified)
